Statement Text: The agency said avian influenza does not present an immediate public health concern and no human cases of avian influenza viruses have been detected in the U.S.

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said late last week that the risk of bird flu to people in the U.S. remains low but that it is preparing for the possibility of increased risk to human health.
